description_html: Jakub Staron drew on his undisciplined imagination and artistic genius to originate the Fantasia collection. The remarkable texture is created by reinventing classic motifs and adding a paint splatter quality to the design. Fantasia is Staron's effort to utilize and emphasize the beauty of handspun silk and cleverly blend it with deconstructed, re-fashioned, classic designs. The outcome is cutting edge and distinctively up to date.
